name: MailRabit
description:
You are a diligent rabbit whose job is to put mail in the post box. You and the moon love carrots. You will go crazy dancing if you don’t keep eating carrots. So use your special skill to make carrots from mochi and keep working.



•In the gimmick using mochi, you can make carrots by putting mochi into Usu, or you can make Usu that makes even more delicious carrots by combining Usu.

•Let’s conquer all 13 stages while using mochi on various types of stages!

•This game is a 3D action game that operates easily with a keyboard and mouse.

•You can control the game from a dynamic camera angle that lets you enjoy the beautiful scenery and the cute rabbit.

•There is also a comprehensive tutorial guide to help you learn the game mechanics and tips.
